website_summaries.verdict: A decent option that will get the job done, although the unit has some known flaws.
pros: Provides good heat and does so quickly
A compact unit that takes up little space and is easy to move
cons: Rust is an issue, even when stored away from rain and moisture
Igniter is temperamental and often will not work

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere for a long lasting grill.
customer_reviews.text: Pan beneath the burners rusted out within two years. considering it was always kept on the patio and out of the rain, I can't recommend this grill. Also, the regulator quit working around the same time. Spend a little extra money and get a better quality product. The only "pro" is that it's nice to have three burners in a small footprint like this, but in the end, what difference does it make if it falls apart?
customer_reviews.author: J Shepperd

customer_reviews.title: Good price, easy build. Will see if it lasts.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used yet but looks great.pre-heated to 500 very quickly. Material is a little thin compared to my old char broil. I know it won't last as long, but I'll review after a few months. *Update 6/3/17* Now that I've been using it a few months, I'm very happy with this grill. I'm not expecting it to last as long as other grills I've owned. But for the price it's great. I lined the drip pan with Aluminum to aid in collecting oil, salts and burn food to make the thin medal last longer. Cleaned the burner shields in the dish washer to make them last. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: NWMike

customer_reviews.title: Has remained an excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this exact grill 5 years ago on 7/15/2015, and it still performs as well today as it did when new. Ignighters still work perfectly, grates have held up beautifully, burners still function as new. It lives outside under a good quality grill cover, and is used year-round. No issues with exterior finishes or propane tank hook-up apparatus.
customer_reviews.author: Laird Young

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: For $213, with instant coupon, it’s the deal of summer. I’ve always been of the mindset that gas grills are disposable. Buy one for $100 - $150, squeeze 2 - 3 years out of it, trash, repeat. (Lookin’ at you, Char-Broil). Anyway, I recommend spending the extra ~50 bucks for this Dyna-Glo. The jump in quality and performance far exceeds the extra 50 dollars. I still expect to replace it in maybe 3 - 4 years, but my user experience will be considerably improved during that time.
customer_reviews.author: Panzer

customer_reviews.title: Complety rusted after less then a year.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price and I really like the look of this grill. But what a piece of junk after only 1 year and 2 months. A rust bucket. It started rusting less then a year in. Always covered and clean. Also the heat control doesn't and hasn't since I had it brand new seem to control the amount of gas/heat from the lowest setting to the highest. I've emailed the company but I am sure they won't stand behind this product. Avoid
customer_reviews.author: Renzo S.

customer_reviews.title: I really like this BBQ
customer_reviews.text: I really like this BBQ. Not too hard to clean (though clean it you must, or else the catching pan can catch on fire!), gets nice and hot reasonably quickly, and fits in our tight balcony space. Really happy with this buy! Please note that we do not use the arms, due to space constraint, but they seem well enough built! Only complaint is that there is no where to hang tools if the arms are down, kind of frustrating, but that's how it is.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Add some extra cash and buy something of a better quality.
customer_reviews.text: Rusted burner, grills and bottom tray in less than 2 years! And we live in CA where there is very little rain and virtually or humidity. Junk. Stay away. Add some extra cash and buy something of a better quality.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled with our grill!
customer_reviews.text: Received at the end of May to replace previous grill that was huge and had deteriorated. Our daughter assembled it herself; she only needed a hand lifting it at two points. It’s the perfect size for a family of two, three or four. I love that the griddle is in manageable pieces that can be easily cleaned. I thought I’d miss the external burner, but I really don’t! Well priced. Too soon to comment on durability.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Writer

customer_reviews.title: Florida experienced griller
customer_reviews.text: I've had many grills over the years we cook out often , beef, chicken, fish and veggies . Think this one is the best . Perfect size I cooked 8 boneless rib eye steaks at the same time Saturday . easy to clean and access the gas tank and tools through its front door . Has 4 castor wheels two that steer so it's easy to roll. And it's three separately controlled burners heat up fast reaching 650 an a short time . The side tables lock in place and have ample hooks for fork spatula and tong plus gril mit so you are not knocking them off on the floor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sized grill
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sized grill. Compat, yet with a cooking surface almost as large as the 4-burner that this replaced. It is by far the most compact grill that can store the tank inside and having a great cooking surface. Controls and lighter are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: baron95

customer_reviews.title: Not quality construction and parts
customer_reviews.text: I bought this guy in August, 2016. 1 year later, the whole unit was wobbly, as well as the grease catch totally rusted out and fell apart. This unit was kept under my porch away from elements. DynaGlo replaced the grease catch n/c. It's December 2018, the unit is about to fall apart for it being so wobbly, and, guess what -- the grease catch rusted out and fell apart again. It's going in the trash tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: John Roubal

customer_reviews.title: Lasted Two Years
customer_reviews.text: Bottom finally fell out of this grill last week but I guess this is how all these types of grills eventually end. Heavily used for two years and now it's going to the dump. I had already replaced the tents once. But there's no replacing the bottom. So three stars because it was good while it lasted. But like all gas grills for $250 for two years, it is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Boswell

customer_reviews.title: Learn from my mistake.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for $250 in 2016. Worked great initially. Accurate. Good design. Seemed durable. After 10 months, the grease pan disintegrated (only small pieces remained) due to rust. To replace the grease tray costs $79. Temperature no longer works properly. Very difficult to control outcome when temperature fluctuates randomly. We love to grill out, but never intended to replace our grill every year. Very disappointed. Bad purchase. I do not recommend this grill.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C.

customer_reviews.title: Broken magnetic latch.
customer_reviews.text: We love our grill but were dissatisfied that the magnetic door latch was broken. We put the item number and a picture of the broken part in the packaging review. We hoped to receive a replacement part instead of having to pack the entire thing up and return it.
customer_reviews.author: Tulip

customer_reviews.title: and was not disappointed. My grill here at the house was getting ...
customer_reviews.text: This my 2nd Dyna-Glo, and I would buy another. I am an airline captain and have two homes. I bought this last year for my apt.and was not disappointed. My grill here at the house was getting old so ordered another Dyna-Glow. Its very easy to put together and looks great. Fired it up and grilled a NY Strip. Perfect!! I like charred steak and this grill will get to 750 degrees. So if your trying to decide between Weber or this baby, save your money and buy this. You will not be disappointed. Rob
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Push Button Ignition is Awesome Fast
customer_reviews.text: What a nice unit. Push button burner ignition is awesome fast. Big detailed temperature gage. Super adjustable burners. I gave away my old worn out five burner bbq; we never used more than two burners at a time. This three burner unit is a perfect size for our family of four plus a few of the neighbors. Arrived with a broken part. Customer service kicked in and expect new part to be on its way any time now. Should be an easy screw driver to the rescue fix :)
customer_reviews.author: Flash Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great size, good quality, but TERRIBLE photos in the assembly instructions
customer_reviews.text: The photos in the instructions are terrible quality and difficult to make out. However, if you have some experience building "stuff" you can guess your way through assembly. Sheet metal is thinner than more expensive grills, but that's one reason this grill costs less. Happy with the purchase, great size for my family, and would recommend it to anyone wanting something a little smaller and less expensive than competitors.
customer_reviews.author: Jason G. Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: ... you want a grill that is well-designed and looks nice, buy this one
customer_reviews.text: If you want a grill that is well-designed and looks nice, buy this one. If you want a grill that will last, go elsewhere. After two years, my grill is a rust bucket. Tents, burners, even the pan. My grill has always been covered. And try to buy replacement parts – they are not a common dimension. You can’t just go to Home Depot and buy universal sizes that fit almost every other manufacturer's grills. So the price for replacement parts you can even source is sky-high. It’s a shame to see a really sharp looking (and not cheap) grill go to the recycling center after just two years.
customer_reviews.author: STUART C THOMPSON

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last 4 years with light use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the grill 4 years ago. It is on a deck with complete roof and protected on two sides. I grill about once a month in winter and maybe once a week or less in summer. The grill has serious rust problems and is not really usable. Oh, I am 100 miles inland. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Intruder

customer_reviews.title: Have been happy with it but I think it has a two ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this grill for two years. Have been happy with it but I think it has a two year life and that is about it. Pros - easy start. even flame. easy to clean. small footprint Cons - drip pan rusts through in a few years. Grates are rusting out. The sides of the lid are beginning to rust. The heat tents rusted out completely The grill has been kept under a covered patio. If you clean the drip pan after every use it should last longer but that is a pain.
customer_reviews.author: sid

customer_reviews.title: Rust bucket!
customer_reviews.text: Well exactly 1 year later, kept under the Dyna glo made to fit cover the removable drip pan has rusted completely through. I had high hopes for this grill. As I have found, no matter how much you spend? Grills are just not made to last! That was my my reason for not spending a fortune again and getting this grill. However, this one breaks the record for a part completely disintegrating in one year! Even better, the black sides are nothing but orange rust! So much for stainless!
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Good at first but doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: We bought this grill for our summer rental property. We were obviously drawn to it's low price and the smaller size was good for our patio. As a gas grill, it functions well. However like others have commented, one after one season of use, we need to replace the grease pan and heat tents due to use and rust. Granted, the renters probably didn't clean the grill as often or as well as they should have. Next year I'll cover the grease pan in tin foil in the hopes it will extend the life of the parts.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic grill!
customer_reviews.text: This little grill takes up little space but it has a pretty big cook area. I used it yesterday and put potatoes on the shelf. and meat on the grids. Everything was delicious! Heats very evenly, easy cleanup, grease does not drip on the flame so no flareups. All the parts that get drips are removable so you can easily wash them. The reason I bought this grill was that it has 3 burners and the sides fold down so the grill takes up little space on my patio. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: sissie1214

customer_reviews.title: It was a good dent on the bottom stand near a wheel
customer_reviews.text: Grilled arrived with a dent from the factory and not from shipping. It was a good dent on the bottom stand near a wheel. The dent was painted or plated, so it happened at the factory. The propane regulator freezes up in the summer time while using two different bottles. A 40 or an 80 pound. Don't buy. Not worth aggregation
customer_reviews.author: kindle fire owner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Grill for Us
customer_reviews.text: This grill is awesome! I was looking for a smaller gas grill and read a lot of reviews. It was actually Mark's review ( that sold me on it -- and I was not at all disappointed. It really was pretty much exactly as he described. I can't even begin to do justice to it (go read his review, please). But I did want to add that it entirely lived up to expectations. My dad and I put it together in a little more than an hour (as I recall) and my dad and step mom loved it so much that they immediately bought one of their own!
customer_reviews.author: FearsomeKitty

customer_reviews.title: Love / Hate
customer_reviews.text: This had a great price and was easy to assemble. It cooks far superior to our Kenmore grill of the same size and specs. Heats up fast and gets real hot. But ... the grease tray rusted out and just dropped onto the gas tank after 15 months of use. We also keep unit out of the weather, so there is no excuse for the parts to rust out just over a year old. I just updated this. I got a hold of the company and they are replacing the parts 3 months out of warranty. It's now a "buy" from me!
customer_reviews.author: 3gulf3

customer_reviews.title: This Grill is Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This grill is really awesome. I was worried about it only having 3 burners, as I always had the big 5 burner grills. The main grill has good space and the upper grill shelf has plenty of room for veggies. When we put it together (which was easy) we fired it up. Within 4 minutes it had heated to 600 degrees! It is extremely responsive to changing the temperature and I cannot be more pleased with it. I was able to cook steaks as well as veggies with precision. I am a happy camper. The only downside is the handle gets hot on the left hand corner, but the middle stays cool.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C.

customer_reviews.title: Grill works great, Customer support even better
customer_reviews.text: Grill works great for what it is. It's small, it's mostly stainless and it's cheap. That's what I wanted and that what I got. Unfortunately, the drip/catch pan under the grill completely rusted out in just under 2 years. Not that bad, but with a quick email to Dyna-Glo, they shipped me a brand new one at no cost in less than a week and the grill is almost as good as new! The heat tents will need to be replaced soon, but that's pretty typical for most budget grills after a couple years.
customer_reviews.author: Adam G

customer_reviews.title: Terrific grill, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this two months ago to replace a Lowes no-name three burner grill that refused to get above 375 degrees. After a true sticker shock experience with the similar Weber model, I read the reviews, and gave this a try, demonstrating to my family my thriftiness (some might give it a different name) by purchasing an Amazon "cosmetic damage" used model. I am now delighted to use this well-designed grill. It looks good, takes minimum space, rapidly delivers great heat, and offers easy cleaning with its removable grease tray. Because I bought this used, there were two screws missing, and I contacted customer service. Their response was immediate and courteous. They back their products, and now, so do I.
customer_reviews.author: Generic Personage

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this grill largely on the reviews from Amazon as a gift Would not purchase it again. The igniter on the right doesn't always start that section of the grill. Flairs up big time with grease even after and and scraped around the deflectors and the big one it's rusting! Yes, the cover is rusting. I purchased this back in the summer and not more than a few months later the black on the cover is rusting through. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Great grill the best I have bought, but will not buy again because of the cheap wheels and confusing instructions for wheel plac
customer_reviews.text: A great grill, love it all, and great value for the money, the only problem and a big one is the wheels are so cheap, and confusing to put on, they need four swivel wheels , a poor way to cut corners a great grill , but the wheels are terrible and need to be upgraded, and instructions for the wheels are terrible, if you need to push grill around look else where, worst wheels ever.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: I have only had for 2 months, used 3x's and now it doesnt work.
customer_reviews.text: This grill is easy to put together and looks nice. But, the 1st 2 times I used it it worked great.....I just went to use it for the 3rd time last night and now the gas will not go on high. The knobs are turned to high but the flame is super low and the it will not get any hotter than 250 degrees. I even bought the matching cover for it wich is very nice and fits perfect even though my grill is on a covered patio. I am very disappointed in this grill and Dyna-Glo!
customer_reviews.author: T. Tracy

customer_reviews.title: RUST EVERYWHERE
customer_reviews.text: Several key parts rusted after just one year. After two years, the grill is becoming useless. I suspect that most positive reviews were made during the grill's "honeymoon phase"
customer_reviews.author: Joe Sixpack

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this grill
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this grill. It has preformed exactly as expected and its the perfect compromise between high end and low end. Built this thing 20 minutes and it was the terrifically easy. Love the castor feet. Love the Aluminum door. Love the temp gauge. Love the propane tank mold and fastener. Love the folding sides. Love the 3 burners. Love the grates-not too narrow or wide. Grilling has been an absolute joy with this thing. This is just an excellent all around gas grill. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: JediShopper

customer_reviews.title: I got Two!
customer_reviews.text: put it into a rental four plex about six months ago and it had done all that anyone has asked of it, admittedly probably just burgers, chicken breasts and steaks. Three burners are adequate for almost any size party and heat seems even and adjustable to about 500 degrees, so not a searing grill. Assembles in about an hour but read directions carefully or you will inevitably get casters and side panels in wrong locations. I ordered a second for our beach house as well as patio is small and side tables fold down to require a really small storage space on the patio.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Fire box failure
customer_reviews.text: I purchased in late 2018. It was kept under a covered roof and also covered with the manufactured cover after every use. I used about 10 times and the fire bow while in use collapsed. The hot fire box fell to the gas line and tank. Thankful not one was hurt. This is a deficiency of quality. Based on use and care this should not have occurred. The rest of the grill is in perfect condition. This a severe safety hazard. And should be addressed by the manufacture and it vendor who they source from.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: What a great little grill! Probably wouldn't be ideal for someone who entertains very large crowds often, but for a smaller family or gathering, this is the perfect size! It holds about 8 hamburger patties on the lower grill and a dozen or so hot dogs on the top rack so it can hold a lot of food. Most of the grills this size only have 2 burners so finding this one with 3 was great and helps the food cook faster and more evenly. The drop down sides make it compact for smaller outdoor spaces and makes it really easy to cover. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: A greed to grill for a small place
customer_reviews.text: I have had several grills over the year. While this one is the smallest it works perfect for a small porch or someone that is space conscious. It starts up every single time and produces more than enough heat to see your my steaks cooked the chicken and everything between. Been very happy with the experience
customer_reviews.author: Keibbler

customer_reviews.title: Son says my Dyna-Glo outperforms his $1200 (Genesis) grill
customer_reviews.text: Husband lost interest in outdoor grilling, and I hated the mess and time required for charcoal grilling. So, Mama made a decision, researched on the internet and came up with my Dyna-Glo gas grill. I love it and to make things even better, after berating my choice, etc., my son had to admit it outperformed his high-priced grill in several areas when he used it! My only complaint is that the grease cup is an irregular size because I cannot find the foil liner cups to fit it. But, no big deal, I just make my own.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Saha

customer_reviews.title: ASSEMBLY WOES
customer_reviews.text: ASSMBLY INSTRUCTIONS NEEDS SOME WORK, LACKING IN DETAILS, PHOTOS ARE OF NO HELP, MOSTLY DARKER SHADES OF GRAY. BATTERY FURNISHED WITH IGNITER WAS DEAD OUT OF THE BOX. MACHINE SCREWS WERE DIFFICULT TO START UNLESS PERFECTLY ALIGNED. ONE STRIPPED OUT AND I HAD TO DRILL OUT AND REPLACE WITH NUT AND BOLT. THERE WERE SEVERAL CHIPS IN THE EXTERNAL ENAMELED FINISH. ON THE POSITIVE SIDE THE PACKING WAS OUTSTANDING AND ARRIVED IN NEW AND UNDAMAGED CONDITION. WITH 3 BURNER LIT GRILL HEATED TO 600F IN 10-12 MINUTES. THAT'S A PLUS. AFTER THE FIRST USE THE PORCELAIN HAD BURNED OFF THE GRATE IN SEVERAL PLACES. VERY DISAPPOINTING. AT THIS POINT I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! Bought the brown color because it matched our back deck decor nicely. I bought the Dynaglow cover as well and covered it after every use. We didn’t use it much due to cold weather and rain. Went to lift the cover off after only 2 uses and found the paint degraded and turning white. I want a refund, probably should have just spent the money on Weber.
customer_reviews.author: Brian T.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I need
customer_reviews.text: Great grill! It wasn't too bad to put together, but not the easiest either. The pictures in the instruction manual had almost no contrast so at times the orientation of a part was very difficult to discern. That doesn't really matter once you get it set up though because this grill is great! Three burners helps with even heat dispersal, and the stainless steel looks very good. Fits nicely on my small balcony when I have one of the shelves folded down. Exactly what I was looking/hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: It lasted exactly 2 years with light use
customer_reviews.text: I would never purchase this again. If I wanted garbage, I could have spent less. It was great the first year. This year, heat control was way off. It’s now too dangerous to use. To the dump it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Cook

customer_reviews.title: Grill Looks great and seems very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Took about an hour to install by myself. Grill Looks great and seems very sturdy. Hooked up the gas and it fired right up. Weight is 97 pounds, bless the poor UPS man. Just be careful with your back if moving it by yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Keller

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product overall. Warning...Clean the drip tray.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Gets hot quickly. Easy to work with. Could use a better storage area underneath. Warning: Make sure you clean the drip tray now and then. It pulls out easily from behind. The drip bucket does not fill much, but the drip tray does. Otherwise, a well-built, efficient, easy to use, easy to clean, pretty easy to roll once you get the hang of it, useful, compact...all around quite good. Good value, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this compact grill.
customer_reviews.text: Received the grill it was easy to put together. Took two of us to put the top on but assembled in less than an hour. So happy to have a small compact grill. It’s perfect for our patio. I did purchase th me grill cover as other reviewers recommended to keep the grill looking new. We have had the grill for about 2 months now and use it often.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn McCall

customer_reviews.title: Best Grill I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this grill. Can't see paying for the Weber grills at those prices and been through enough cheaper brands to want something of better quality. This is the answer in every way. Had it 5 months now so I have used it a lot. Keep it on the covered porch. But trust me at 67 been through lots of cheap grills this is the best by far. Have two rental cabins and this will be going in them both.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your $$, very happy with this grill
customer_reviews.text: While I cannot comment on long-term durability yet, I absolutely love this grill. It took me less than hour to assemble, at a reasonably relaxed pace (only complaint is pictures in the directions are in black and white and the grill is black/silver which can be a bit difficult to see). The grill functions exceptionally, it heats up fast and has taken a bit to get used to just how fast this heats up. The folding side trays are very nice for space saving and overall it seems very well made and more than worth the $$ I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Parts are not readily available - heat shield - makes the grill unusable
customer_reviews.text: The heat shield under the burners rots out after about a year of use and there is no replacement available. I like the grill and would rate it higher, but I can't find the correct parts for it. Therefore, I cannot recommend it and will never buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: TCH

customer_reviews.title: Rusting after only a year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this grill a year ago. When it wasn't being used, I covered it with a Duck cover. Even with that extra care, it has started rusting after only a year. In addition, the door never closed correctly. There has to be another grill out there that delivers better value for money. This one doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Anders

customer_reviews.title: Rusting Away
customer_reviews.text: After 3-4 seasons with a DynaGlo cover on it, All the black pieces have some degree of rust. Read the reviews, this is a common theme... Too bad, the unit cooks extremely well, heat is quick and even, just wont last that many seasons.
customer_reviews.author: D. Quatrini

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Thought
customer_reviews.text: After much research we bought this grill. It is very sharp looking. Worked great at the beginning. But it doesn't last long. I do my best to keep it clean. The grate is falling apart. I can only use 1 or 2 burners at very low setting. If I use a 3, I will have flames shooting out the grill. Too hot. Because of that, there are burn marks on the hood of the grill. The lid keeps falling off. Have to tighten the screws every time to open the lid. Very disappointed in the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It went together smoothly and the instructions were very good. The packaging was done well
customer_reviews.text: Just assembled my new grill yesterday. It went together smoothly and the instructions were very good. The packaging was done well, so there were was no damage. The small parts were arranged well on a separate pack so it was easy to identify the proper part for the location in question. My previous grill was a Craftsman and was not as well designed as this one. Have lit it up but have not cooked on it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Now that the unit is assembled, it works well. The quality is several steps above my previous bbq. It has solid construction and the parts were all there. Took me about 2 hours to install. The instruction book, although correct for the most part, had one major flaw. The quality of the print for viewing pictures of the task at hand were terrible and over inked so couldn't always make out details. Other than that, good product and fairly priced. Delivered promptly and packaged professionally.
customer_reviews.author: Lane Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: BBQ Damaged
customer_reviews.text: 1. The first BBQ they sent was damaged. The box was dropped by the shipper or the supplier and they tapped up the box where the box was damaged and sent it anyway. 2. The second BBQ sent was not damaged but the manufacture did not install the nut that for the screw that holds up the right side of the BBQ. I had to drill a hole in the wheel mount and install a bolt through it to fasten the right side. Instructions were one of the worst I have ever read and tried to follow... Other than that the BBQ works fine....
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: RUST!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Rust, Rust and more Rust. All the internal parts have rusted in slightly over a year. I am fanatical about keeping my grill covered, it's never exposed to the elements. Not that it matters, the cooking grates have rusted, the grease pan has rusted (so badly it's fallen apart), the heat tents have rusted. I've never owned a grill like this that has rusted so quickly. I know the parts do not last forever, especially for a low cost grill like this and need to be replaced but not after a single year of use. Before all the rust the grill operated superbly, it heated quickly, maintained a high temperature, overall it performed well.
customer_reviews.author: Strommy

customer_reviews.title: Love- Hate
customer_reviews.text: I want to give this grill more stars because it lasted 4 years....however, it stopped heating evenly after the first year. The rest of the grill held up pretty well. I now have the dilemma on what to buy next. I keep being told to invest in a Weber.
customer_reviews.author: Prim74

customer_reviews.title: Only lasts a year or two, read the reviews!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, high quality cast iron grates, sturdy and lights on first try every time. UPDATE: 3 years after purchase, the entire bottom pan is completely rusted and partially fell out. Also this grill catches fire on anything other than the lowest settings, even with between meal cleanings and removal of grease and leftover foods. The grill is essentially useless now. I only left 2 stars because it worked well for a couple of years before becoming useless and a waste of money. I DO NOT recommend this grill if you want a lasting quality product.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Nice Grill
customer_reviews.text: Received well packaged grill. I was able to put it together by myself in a little over an hour but a second set of hands would have shortened the assembly time for sure. The directions were really well written and easy to follow. Once assembled the grill is really attractive. The only issue is that the 3 burner really isn't much bigger than the two burner so deciding where to place food and which burners to use is kind of weird. I probably could have just bought a two burner and been perfectly happy. The temperature / heat gets hot quickly and everything I've cooked so far cooked very evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Terradog

customer_reviews.title: Compact overall size, but inconsitent heating
customer_reviews.text: Rear of the grill is way hotter than the front. Hard to get things to cook at the same rate since there is such a huge difference. I got the grill specifically because of the folding side tables so it wouldn't take up a ton of space while not in use, so it is great in that regard...but the performance of the grill makes me hardly ever want to use it.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: fine for four months, then beware....
customer_reviews.text: I've had the grill less than a year with the cover on when not in use. 10 months later the grill is badly rusting on the top and the igniter hasn't worked since March. I had high hopes for Dyna-glo as they seemed to be a reputable company but I'll be looking to replace this grill after just 1 year. I purchased it last year off of a lightning deal at $199 and now less than a year later the REGULAR price is $192. Fairly disappointed all the way around with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad product, does not fit together.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible instructions, impossible to assemble. I had a BBQ scheduled for later in the week and was screwed when I ordered this and it was not possible to assemble based on the instructions. Returned and bought an even crappier grill from home Depot that was assembled. Instructions and fit of this grill we're horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have been very pleased with this grill
customer_reviews.text: I have been very pleased with this grill. I initially wanted a Weber, however could not justify the price of the similar model for my apartment balcony. I have been very pleased with the model.. I like that the shelves on the side can be moved down for storage. The three burners do an excellent job of evenly heating the cooking area.
customer_reviews.author: DMoney

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put together by myself
customer_reviews.text: I use this grill about 4 - 5 times a week. It was easy to put together by myself. One thing I noticed is that if you leave it uncovered when it rains, the small grease tray will fill with water. So far it has lit every time with a push of the button. It does get hot and if you cook with the lid down and want a low temperature, you need only use one burner or it will get up over 500 degrees without a problem. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tony O

customer_reviews.title: Best craftsmanship I have seen in my lifetime of experience with gas grilles.  Top quality fittings.
customer_reviews.text: Recieved the grille today. Took my time to assemble, took about 2 hours. I am very impressed with the construction of this product, I have never had a grille that had brass fitting for the screws. Top quality imo. The packing was excellent, but be patient as you unpack. May have taken as long to unpack it as it did to build it. Very well engineered. Now I will see how it cooks. But so far I love this grille.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy R Young

customer_reviews.title: It is nice. Is it as well made
customer_reviews.text: It is nice. Is it as well made, high quality of a Fleber? no, but for half the price it doesnt need to be. Grates & body metal not as stout as a fleber, but at half the cost... it is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Hemius Maximus

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned super expensive grills and this one is up there. Great grill for small gatherings. Easily grill for my friends in no time. Hosted about 40 people and this trill makes it happen.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Very simple and easy to put together and to operate gas grill
customer_reviews.text: Very simple and easy to put together and to operate gas grill. I have used it for five times so far with no problems. We will see how long it last
customer_reviews.author: Normal

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical ordering a grill online but had a hard time finding a decent one at local stores. This turned out to be a good purchase and the grill is easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole-KC

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product back in July 2017. I used two dozen of the time. Start after several months use the gas burner is not enough fire to grill the food. Today, the middle burner is completely out. It's not working. I can't return this product after 5 months. I'm very frustrated. This grill is crap.
customer_reviews.author: Taka  Nakagawa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together by yourself!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this barbecue and instructions said you need 2 people to put it together so I left it for a month while I tried to find someone to help me, I couldn’t find anyone that wanted to help me (instructions look complicated at first reading), so one night I put it together by myself, it is not hard! Just takes time. I love this barbecue!
customer_reviews.author: CV

customer_reviews.title: Great grill, especially for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Love this grill!’ Still using it a year later. Heats up fast, cooks evenly, and folds up nice so it doesn’t take up much room in the garage. Get the matching cover!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Castle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect BBQ for Small Patio
customer_reviews.text: Great BBQ - just the right size for our small patio area. My 15 year old son and I put it together in about 1 1/2 hrs. Directions that came with it were awful but enough to point us in the right direction so we could assemble it. Don't let that discourage you from buying this BBQ. It's not hard to assemble and anyone with basic talent in putting things together can do it. I've used it once and it cooks beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: snav

customer_reviews.title: it seems well built and love the way it looks
customer_reviews.text: Just received my grill! It's now awaiting to be used for the first time. For the money, it seems well built and love the way it looks. Previously, I had a Char-Broil Performance TRU-Infrared 340 2-Burner Gas Grilll of similar price and size for about 5 years. I really was dissatisfied with it because the infrared system did not cook well and it was extremely hard to clean. I will be updating from time to time as I access Dyna-Glo's performance and any issues I encounter.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K Haas

customer_reviews.title: Great price, good grill
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to put together. It doesn’t roll well as 2 wheels are fixed and the flames don’t come up high enough. However, you also won’t burn anything because the flame, even on high, are low.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have fun looking for replacement parts
customer_reviews.text: At first site after i put it together this grill looked amazing but after 2 seasons every thing on the inside rusted out. I cleaned it after every use and covered through the winter with I insulated cover. What is disappointing is I can'tfindreplacent parts for it bad company no customerservichelp at all.
customer_reviews.author: catherine

customer_reviews.title: Two years, and going strong
customer_reviews.text: I live in Maine and this stays outside the entire year (I keep my deck shoveled so I can grill year round). Heats up faster than any grill I've ever owned. I like that the sides fold down for compact storage. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: aPlateOfGrapes

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Right off the bat, I recognised the quality. Took a while to put together. However, I expected that. I highly recommend this grill. The 3 burners allow for more control of the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Cube

customer_reviews.title: Well designed grill with 3 burners.
customer_reviews.text: What a great little grill. Having the three burners is a plus (many this size only have two burners. Having used it over the last few months I can't find any faults with this grill. Would recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Great little gas grill
customer_reviews.text: Great little gas grill. We've got a small patio and this unit fits perfectly. Easy to assemble. 3 burners provide plenty of heat. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: M. R. Colella

customer_reviews.title: Starts off well, but doesn't stand test of time
customer_reviews.text: The grill worked great, but we did have rusting issues, like others, especially with dip pan which disintegrated after 2 years. Our grill was covered and out of rain.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and use. Great grill for the price and I have had no issues since the year I bought it. A cover is recommended
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money ....
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in good condition and just about all put together. That was a blessing. Like the other comments said, it sure gets HOT in just a few minutes. Not as heavy built as those that cost more but still fits the bill. It's a space saver with the two drop down slelves. So far it lights on the first push. Looks easy to clean and will last a number of years, go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Tulsa666

customer_reviews.title: Great small 3 burner grill
customer_reviews.text: The grill looks good and seems to work great. The shelves could be moved up and down easier, but it is rare to have a grill like this that you can actually make compact. I had some trouble finding a cover, and wish it shipped with one, as the 2 burner one by Dyna-Glo does ship with a cover. The grill is sturdy and cooks well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tahoe Dad

customer_reviews.title: Nice Grill worth your money.
customer_reviews.text: Nice Quality easy to put together only 29" wide but can still cook for a family of 4 easily great for a small porch or any area with a space restriction. and just a little FYI the Glorious Montana 7569 Premium Cover for Spirit 200/300 Series fits this grill perfect. the cover is good quality and is adjustable zips up to 30" and works for this grill and can be unzipped up to 50" wide to cover a larger grill.
customer_reviews.author: Dare to satisfy me

customer_reviews.title: Looks sturdy and heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: just assembled. Looks sturdy and heavy duty. easy assemble, but when you install the side tables, the brackets are installed on the side in the silver holes. then the big screws are in and they just are inserted. instructions are not clear in some places. so had issues, but got it together and is fine. there is a part that is not included in the package "on purpose" but you dont' need it to operate the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Beware of rust.
customer_reviews.text: Cooks great, but after 4 years and always covered with the DynaGlo cover just about all major parts have complete rusted. Poor materials and quality. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Scuba Diver

customer_reviews.title: some of the metal frame was slightly warped
customer_reviews.text: I love this grill. It is the perfect size for our small patio and performs well. I docked it a star due to the fact that a couple of the metal frame pieces arrived slightly warped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... actually a gift but the recipient seems to really like it. Was looking for a grill that had ...
customer_reviews.text: This was actually a gift but the recipient seems to really like it. Was looking for a grill that had enough cook space for a moderate gathering but would fit into a small deck space. Fit the bill perfectly. He has become a better cook since the new grill. Cleans easy, heats quickly and cooks evenly so far.
customer_reviews.author: mnnice

customer_reviews.title: Excellent smaller grill for tight spaces!
customer_reviews.text: It's a little early to give a full review, but this grill is working out great so far. I was in search of a grill that was compact, but not cheap like some small grills. I also didn't want a fancy grill that was going to cost me an arm and a leg. This grill seemed to be the best option and I'm glad I bought it. It puts out a lot of heat and grills items evenly. The item arrived quickly and was easy to setup! Definitely recommend this grill for smaller spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Deaton76

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: We've been happy with this so far - seems like a great grill, especially for more compact spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Gas connection leak
customer_reviews.text: Very low quality in gas connection. The gas connection is leaking and this connection sounds low quality.
customer_reviews.author: Christiano Carvalho

customer_reviews.title: Nice Grill, happy so far.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice grill so far. After a going through a couple of grills that have uneven heating we are please with this one. It heats fast and seems to have a nice spread of heat without cool spots. I bought the matching cover and hope that helps keep it in good working order longer than out last el-ceapo grille from HomeDepot.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rowland

customer_reviews.title: Hold up well over the years!
customer_reviews.text: Love this grill! I got it for a great price and have had it 2 years now!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Space saver! Great cook!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the hubs. He loves it! Cooks great and stores so much better than our old one.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Abbey

customer_reviews.title: It is the perfect size, was not difficult to put together at ...
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my sister, and she LOVES this grill. It is the perfect size,was not difficult to put together at all. She is the grill-mister and is delighted! Thank you amazon for saving me once again!
customer_reviews.author: Cyd

customer_reviews.title: but works well enough until we can spend the money on a really nice one. Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Kinda cheap, a few hot spots, but works well enough until we can spend the money on a really nice one. Easy to clean, easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: tmb

customer_reviews.title: Best amazon purchase so far!
customer_reviews.text: One of my best amazon purchases so far. Had it almost a year and it fires up every time. About half the price of a comparable store brand and shipping to my home was free. Burns evenly, cleans easily, thermometer works and it looks good!
customer_reviews.author: rkaiser

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality gas grill
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent purchase! Grill is well made, in my view much superior to the Char Broil equivalent, and almost as good as the Weber but costs less than half the price. I have used it four or five times so far with excellent results. Time will tell how well it lasts, but everything so far suggests that it will last a long time. Oh, and I should say that the Grill looks very good indeed and draws admiring comments from everyone that sees it. It was very easy to assemble, with clear and accurate instructions, and took me just over one hour to be up and running. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Colin Bateson

customer_reviews.title: Great grill!
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, three burners, and gets hot fast. Easy to store thanks to the side tables having a mechanism that allows them to fold down. The wheels could be better, but we don't have that much of an issue moving it around when the time comes thanks to it being very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Retrogress

product_meta.title: Dyna-Glo DGB390SNP-D Smart Space Living 36,000 BTU 3-Burner LP Gas Grill
product_meta.description: Color:Stainless SteelThe Dyna-Glo DGB390SNP-D Smart Space Living Gas Grill is designed to fit on smaller decks and patios, providing the style, efficiency and high performance cooks expect when investing in an outdoor grill. Made of stainless steel and black painted steel end caps and 507-total inches of cooking space, the (3) stainless steel tube burners provide 12,000-BTUs each (36,000 total) and are protected by (3) enameled steel heat tents that distribute heat evenly. An electric pulse ignition activates the burners, which are controlled by (3) dials to customize the heat temperature for your specific needs. The easy to clean, enameled cast iron cooking grates provide 390-square inches of primary cooking space. An additional 117-square inches are available through a raised secondary warming rack. The hood lid has an easy lift handle for opening and is designed with a double-wall liner to retain heat. Additional features include drop down tables with tool hooks and towel bars on either side of the grill to provide counter space and utensil storage, a single door cabinet with a "tank seat" propane storage area and (2) locking and (2) non-locking heavy-duty wheel casters at the base of the grill.
feature_bullets: Easy push button electronic pulse ignition system ensures quick start-up; 390 sq in of primary cooking space; 507 sq in of total cooking space.
(2) Heavy gauge porcelain enameled cast iron cooking grates retain heat to sear foods and lock in foods natural juices
(3) Stainless steel commercial grade straight burners for performance and durability (3) Steel Heat tents protect the burners and flavor foods
Infinite control valve options provide flexibility and the best grilling performance and experience
Double wall stainless steel lid assembly to retain heat includes temperature gauge; Side shelves with integrated towel bar and tool hooks
Protect your grill with a custom fit Dyna-Glo premium cover, Model # DG300C (sold separately)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars697 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
